title: Hextech
body:
Just played a game and got an S- but not chest, anyone else have that happen?   Not mad, they are giving away free things, but just curious.  Yes i got a real S-, no i did not screen shot it, yes it was on a champion I had not already gotten one from.


Have a great day!!!

replies.body: You may not have earned a chest if you already earned a chest for that champion this season.  Also, you have to have the champion unlocked so you won't grab a chest if it was on a free weekly champ.  More info is always available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xMWBMMNk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-13T21:23:38.855+0000)
>
> You may not have earned a chest if you already earned a chest for that champion this season.  Also, you have to have the champion unlocked so you won't grab a chest if it was on a free weekly champ.  More info is always available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!


One, thank you for replying.

Two,  i have not earned a chest on this champion and i own them.

Three it seemed like a lot of people got S this game also.

Not sure if you can see it,but here is the game..

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2398559416/220234826?tab=overview


again thank you for the reply.

Thanks for the link!  I took a look into this for you, and it actually looks like you're out of mastery chest drops for the week after you obtained one for Alistar the other day.  You'll have to wait a bit before you can obtain another for the week.  If you're on the legacy client, you can see how many are available in your profile, next to the amount of ARAM rerolls you have.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xMWBMMNk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-13T22:24:59.720+0000)
>
> Thanks for the link!  I took a look into this for you, and it actually looks like you're out of mastery chest drops for the week after you obtained one for Alistar the other day.  You'll have to wait a bit before you can obtain another for the week.  If you're on the legacy client, you can see how many are available in your profile, next to the amount of ARAM rerolls you have.  Hope that helps!

Thanks for the response.  Have a great weekend.
